Title: Relates to authorizing the city of Albany to add unpaid housing code violation penalties, costs and fines to such city's annual tax levy
Summary: Authorizes the city of Albany to add unpaid housing code violation penalties, costs and fines to such city's annual tax levy.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to authorizing the city of Albany to add unpaid housing code violation penalties, costs and fines to such city's annual tax levy
